summary: Production Features Testing Complete - All new features working. Trading Playground, Autonomous AI Bot, Training Center, Exchange Integration, and Social Integration all functional. Backend: 32/32 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All new tabs (Playground, AI Bot, Training) load and display correctly with full functionality.

issues: React Hook dependency warnings in console (non-blocking, cosmetic)

passed_tests: Backend: 32/32 API tests passed (100%)
Backend: POST /api/playground/account - Creates paper trading account with $100,000
Backend: GET /api/playground/account/{id} - Returns account with balance, equity, positions
Backend: POST /api/playground/order - Executes buy/sell market orders with slippage simulation
Backend: POST /api/playground/reset/{id} - Resets account to initial state
Backend: GET /api/playground/leaderboard - Returns top traders
Backend: POST /api/bot/create - Creates bot with conservative/moderate/aggressive strategies
Backend: GET /api/bot/{id} - Returns bot with risk_settings and strategy_settings
Backend: POST /api/bot/{id}/mode - Changes mode (full_auto, semi_auto, paused)
Backend: POST /api/bot/{id}/analyze - Triggers market analysis with technical/sentiment/AI scores
Backend: GET /api/bot/{id}/performance - Returns total_trades, win_rate, recent_signals
Backend: GET /api/bot/{id}/signals - Returns pending signals for semi-auto mode
Backend: GET /api/bot/user/bots - Returns all user bots
Backend: GET /api/training/content - Returns tutorials, lessons, scenarios
Backend: GET /api/training/progress - Returns user XP, level, skills, completed items
Backend: POST /api/training/tutorial/{id}/complete - Completes tutorial and awards XP
Backend: POST /api/training/lesson/{id}/complete - Completes lesson with quiz score
Backend: POST /api/training/backtest - Runs strategy backtest with equity curve
Backend: GET /api/exchange/supported - Returns Binance, Coinbase, Kraken with features
Backend: GET /api/social/trending - Returns fear_greed_index and trending topics
Backend: GET /api/social/sentiment/{symbol} - Returns sentiment_score, sources, influencers
Frontend: Landing page loads with 'Let's make something incredible!' button
Frontend: Main dashboard shows live market data (BTC, ETH, SPY)
Frontend: Navigation tabs include Playground, AI Bot, Training
Frontend: Playground tab shows $100,000 balance, order form, positions
Frontend: Playground has BUY/SELL buttons, symbol selection, quantity input
Frontend: AI Bot tab shows bot status, mode controls, risk settings
Frontend: AI Bot shows recent analysis with signals (BTC, ETH, SOL)
Frontend: Training Center shows level, XP, badges, skills progress
Frontend: Training has Tutorials, Lessons, Scenarios tabs
Frontend: Training tutorials show XP rewards and time estimates
test_credentials: No credentials needed - demo user mode
seed_data_creation: Playground accounts and bots created during testing

mocked_features.note: Several features use MOCKED/simulated data as designed
mocked_list: Social signals (Twitter/Reddit) - MOCKED simulated tweets and sentiment
Exchange trading - Uses testnet by default, simulated when no API keys
Market prices in playground - Simulated with slight variations
Bot market analysis - Simulated technical indicators (RSI, MACD, Bollinger)
Backtest results - Simulated equity curve and trade history

trading_playground.create_account: Working - Creates account with $100,000 virtual money
trading_playground.place_orders: Working - Buy/sell market orders with slippage simulation
trading_playground.view_positions: Working - Shows open positions with unrealized P&L
trading_playground.account_balance: Working - Shows balance, equity, total P&L

autonomous_bot.risk_settings: Working - Max trade size, daily loss limit, stop loss, take profit
autonomous_bot.performance_tracking: Working - Total trades, win rate, recent signals

training_center.tutorials: Working - Welcome, Paper Trading, Risk Management
training_center.lessons: Working - Technical analysis, risk management content
training_center.scenarios: Working - Bull market, bear market, crash scenarios
training_center.backtesting: Working - SMA cross strategy with equity curve

social_integration.symbol_sentiment: Working - Sentiment score, sources, key influencers

context_for_next_testing_agent: All production features are fully implemented and tested. Trading Playground at /api/playground/* endpoints. Autonomous Bot at /api/bot/* endpoints. Training Center at /api/training/* endpoints. Exchange Integration at /api/exchange/* endpoints. Social Integration at /api/social/* endpoints. Frontend components: TradingPlayground.jsx, AutonomousBot.jsx, TrainingCenter.jsx. Social signals, exchange data, and bot analysis use MOCKED/simulated data when API keys are not configured.
